title: Snake Game
description: Creating  a Snake game using javascript is a friendly coding escapade. It offers an enjoyable experience while honing your game development skills.

title: Text-utils Website

title: Currency-Converter
description: Creating a currency converter is a web app allowing users to input amounts, select currencies for conversion, and see the converted result based on exchange rates.
